description: A playful twist on polar bears' winter resilience and academic success.
title: Icy Intellect
n_1: Pola and Brrrnie sit with books in a snowy landscape.
c2_1: Born ready! I've got ice in my veins.
n_2: Brrrnie flips through pages with frosty confidence.
c1_2: How do you stay so calm?
n_3: They quiz each other, their breaths fogging in the air.
n_4: Laughing, they feel ready to ace the exams.
